master.file.form.title: Master File Application Form
instruction.help: Instructions for completing sections on form
load.file: Load a Master File Application form
select.file.line:
First time users of this form cannot select a file to load and must create an XML file by completing all the required fields below and clicking on the "Generate XML" button at the bottom of this form. For subsequent uses of this form you can either upload a file by clicking on the "Choose file" button and selecting the .hcsc file or .xml file or you can complete the required fields below to generate a .xml file. If you partially complete the form and click on the “Save Working Copy” button at the bottom of the form it will save a copy on the local workstation for completion at a later time. The file will be saved in the “.hcsc” file format. If you are using a previously submitted .xml file, please update the appropriate fields and verify that the details are accurate for the current transaction prior to filing.
Note: The working copies (files with extension .hcsc) should never be sent Health Canada.
master.file.enrolment: Regulatory Master File Transaction and Application Enrolment
instruction.dossier.id.line1:
eCTD formatted dossier – e123456
Non-eCTD formatted dossier - f1234567
instruction.dossier.id.line2: If filing NEW master file registration, request a new eCTD dossier ID by completing the online Dossier ID request form.
masterfile.name: Master File Name
requester.title: Requester of solicited information
are.fees: Are new fees or revised fees associated with this transactions?
completed.fee.required: A completed fee form is still required, however, the applicable fees will be invoiced.
signed.statement: A statement signed by the individual responsible for the applicant’s financial affairs is included to certify that the fee payable is greater than 10% of the anticipated gross revenue.
fileio.msg.parseFail: Parsing of the file has failed

error.mgs.dossier.id: Incorrect format. The dossier identifier is incorrect.
error.mgs.company.id: Please specify a valid manufacturer company Identifier.

common.saveRevert: Please save or revert the record
alphanumeric6or7: (a lowercase letter followed by 6 or 7 numbers)
msg.err.parseFail: Error: there was an error parsing the working file.
msg.err.jsonparse: There was an error parsing the working file.
msg.err.file.load: There was a problem loading the file.
msg.err.file.type: Error: An invalid file type was selected.
msg.err.form.type: Error: the wrong form type was selected for this form.
msg.err.checksum.fail: The checksum in the file does not match the calculated checksum
section.show.option: [ This section may not be visible. ]
hlp_load2: When continuing with a working copy, the format of the file to load should be .hcsc.
hlp_load3: When viewing/updating a final XML file, the format of the file to load should be .xml.
hlp_transaction1: The Company identifier must be obtained from the final company XML file, issued by Health Canada.
hlp_transaction2: The Dossier identifier can be obtained from the final dossier XML file or other Health Canada issued document.(e.g. HC6-024-m178974).
hlp_contactId: All regulatory correspondence will be sent to this contact, but the licence will be issued to the Manufacturer. A medical device licence application can be submitted by a third party.
hlp_deviceClass2: Guidance Document - Guidance on the Risk-based Classification System for Non-In Vitro Diagnostic Devices (non-IVDDs)
hlp_deviceName: Only one name should be entered in this field. The listed name will be used as the licence name unless it is deemed that a generic licence name is more appropriate to cover all of the devices contained within the licence.
hlp_licenceNumber1: This number is assigned by Health Canada once a device(s) has been authorized for sale.
hlp_licenceNumber2: If the Licence number has not yet been assigned, use 000000.
hlp_deviceDetail: The identifiers listed in the device details table must appear on and match the identifier listed on the submitted labelling.

fax.number: Fax Number. By not entering a fax number, you authorise receipt of billing communication by email.
heading.agent.address: Authorized Agent or Authorized Third Party Name and Address
heading.agent.contact: Authorized Agent or Authorized Third Party Contact
info.confirmation: I confirm that the above information is valid
fee.warning1: Do not send fee payment with your Master File, Update or Letter of Access transactions. Health Canada will verify the fee and issue an invoice accordingly.
fee.warning2: For information on Master File fees and payment of invoices, please refer to the
fee.warning.link.title: Funding and Fees webpage.
fee.warning3: Failure to pay fees will result in your Master File being denied access and future transactions being placed on hold or rejected.
are.access.letters: Are there Letter(s) of Access being filed with this transaction?
who.responsible: Who is responsible for payment of fees?
business.num: Canada Revenue Agency Business Number (if applicable)
mf.agent: Authorized Master File Agent / Authorized Third Party
certify.info: I certify that the information and material included in this Master File Application/Transaction is accurate and complete.
full.name: Full name
agent.warning: If the signing official is an Authorized Master File Agent or Authorized Third Party filing on behalf of the Master File Holder, an authorization letter signed by the Master File Holder must be submitted in Module 1.2.1 Application Form. The Agent appointment letter or Third Party Authorization letter is required with the initial Master File Registration transaction or any transaction where a new agent or third party is appointed or the agent or third party's role has changed.
consent.privacy: By submitting your personal information, you are consenting to its collection, use and disclosure in accordance with the Privacy Notice Statement.
